targets.query:
import "strings"
from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "controller/cluster" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cluster.nodes.0.queued")  
    |> map(fn: (r) =>
    ({
    r with 
      _ind: strings.lastIndex(v: r._value, substr: "/ "),
      _value: r._value
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
  r with 
       _files: r._value ,
       _size: strings.substring(v: r._value, start: r._ind+2, end: strings.strlen(v: r._value)),
       _value: int(v: strings.replaceAll(v:strings.replaceAll(v: strings.substring(v: r._value, start: 0, end: r._ind), t: " ", u: ""), t: ",", u: ""))
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)

import "strings"
from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "controller/cluster" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cluster.nodes.1.queued")  
    |> map(fn: (r) =>
    ({
    r with 
      _ind: strings.lastIndex(v: r._value, substr: "/ "),
      _value: r._value
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
  r with 
       _files: r._value ,
       _size: strings.substring(v: r._value, start: r._ind+2, end: strings.strlen(v: r._value)),
       _value: int(v: strings.replaceAll(v:strings.replaceAll(v: strings.substring(v: r._value, start: 0, end: r._ind), t: " ", u: ""), t: ",", u: ""))
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)

import "strings"
from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    r._measurement == "controller/cluster" )
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "cluster.nodes.2.queued")  
    |> map(fn: (r) =>
    ({
    r with 
      _ind: strings.lastIndex(v: r._value, substr: "/ "),
      _value: r._value
    }))
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
  r with 
       _files: r._value ,
       _size: strings.substring(v: r._value, start: r._ind+2, end: strings.strlen(v: r._value)),
       _value: int(v: strings.replaceAll(v:strings.replaceAll(v: strings.substring(v: r._value, start: 0, end: r._ind), t: " ", u: ""), t: ",", u: ""))
    }))
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 5m, fn: mean)

from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "flow/status" and (r._field == "controllerStatus.flowFilesQueued"))
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "_value"], mode: "except")

panels.title: Flow Files in Queue Per Node

alert.message: FLOW FILES IN QUEUE HAS CROSSED 25K, Backpressure on Processor 1.  Configured Threshold per node is 10k.
alert.name: Flow Files in Queue alert

targets.query: SELECT sum("controllerStatus.flowFilesQueued") FROM "flow/status" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

SELECT mean("controllerStatus.flowFilesQueued") as actual,
derivative(mean("controllerStatus.flowFilesQueued"), 3h)  + mean("controllerStatus.flowFilesQueued") as forecast
FROM "flow/status" WHERE $timeFilter 
GROUP BY time(5m) fill(null)

from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "flow/process-groups/root" and 
  r._field == "processGroupFlow.flow.connections.0.status.aggregateSnapshot.flowFilesQueued" or 
  r._field == "processGroupFlow.flow.connections.1.status.aggregateSnapshot.flowFilesQueued" or 
  r._field == "processGroupFlow.flow.connections.2.status.aggregateSnapshot.flowFilesQueued")
SELECT sum("processGroupFlow.flow.connections.0.status.aggregateSnapshot.flowFilesOut") FROM "flow/process-groups/root" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("processGroupFlow.flow.connections.1.status.aggregateSnapshot.flowFilesOut") FROM "flow/process-groups/root" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT sum("processGroupFlow.flow.connections.2.status.aggregateSnapshot.flowFilesOut") FROM "flow/process-groups/root" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "system-diagnostics" and 
  r._field == "systemDiagnostics.aggregateSnapshot.flowFileRepositoryStorageUsage.usedSpaceBytes" or r._field == "systemDiagnostics.aggregateSnapshot.flowFileRepositoryStorageUsage.totalSpaceBytes"
  or r._field == "systemDiagnostics.aggregateSnapshot.flowFileRepositoryStorageUsage.freeSpaceBytes")

alert.message: 1 or more processors are in Stopped State. Please verify desired flow status.
alert.name: Stopped Count

targets.query:
from(bucket: "nifi/autogen")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop:v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "flow/status" and (r._field == "controllerStatus.flowFilesQueued"))
  |> window(every: 5m)
  |> toFloat()
  |> median()
  |> group(columns: ["_time", "_start", "_stop", "_value"], mode: "except")
